title: Angie Kent is impressed with Ciarran Stott's 'abs of steel' and 'chassis' on The Bachelorette
text:
He was ballsy enough to strip off during an art class.

And Angie Kent clearly liked what she saw when Ciarran Stott threw off his black robe on Thursday night's episode of The Bachelorette.

'Everything looked good!' the 29-year-old commented in one of her confessionals.

'Everything looks good!' The Bachelorette's Angie Kent (pictured) was left speechless when Ciarran Stott stripped naked on Thursday

Angie was also left visibly blushing when she drew the former army rifleman's bulging frame with former Gogglebox co-star Yvie Jones.

'It is getting hot in here!' a stunned Angie explained.

Before she added: 'Ciarran's body is immaculate. Abs of steel and [his] butt... the chassis is immaculate.'

Strike a pose: Ciarran (pictured) volunteered to undress for an art class during a group date

A stunned Angie admitted: 'Ciarran's body is immaculate. Abs of steel and [his] butt... the chassis is immaculate'

'Everything looked good!' she continued.

Yvie, who made a guest appearance on the show, also appeared to be in awe of Ciaraan's jaw-dropping body.

'Take it all in... I love this guy!' she informed her best friend.

Shocked: Angie's (left) best friend Yvie Jones (right) also appeared to be in awe as she drew the naked Englishman

After confidently posing, Ciarran admitted it was his first time posing as a life drawing model, but he wanted to impress Angie.

'I've never done anything like this in my life,' he explained.

'I was the only one to put my hand up, so if Angie sees it the way I see it, I hope I get more time with her,' he said.

The Bachelorette continues Wednesday at 7.30pm on Channel Ten.
description: The Bachelorette's Angie Kent was left speechless when Ciarran Stott stripped naked during a group date on Thursday night.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
